duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with the staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, ensuring regular and predictable onsite attendance.
Execute the company's food program and set an example for the staff in displaying a sense of urgency, patience, and leadership.
Lead a team of employees/management, recruit, interview, and hire staff, delegate and follow up on tasks, and teach and motivate others.
Plan and organize tasks, communicate plans and ideas, handle cash-handling and bookkeeping, and solve problems effectively.
Advocate for customer safety and security, and display empathy, especially in a retail setting.
